body_html: Can you explain the benefit of this change? As far as I can tell, all it does is add an indirection, and the file lists aren't shared with other parts of the build. (This is unlike the list of Python modules, which is useful to extract so that it can be used in a consistency-checking test.)
body_text: Can you explain the benefit of this change? As far as I can tell, all it does is add an indirection, and the file lists aren't shared with other parts of the build. (This is unlike the list of Python modules, which is useful to extract so that it can be used in a consistency-checking test.)
body: Can you explain the benefit of this change? As far as I can tell, all it does is add an indirection, and the file lists aren't shared with other parts of the build. (This is unlike the list of Python modules, which is useful to extract so that it can be used in a consistency-checking test.)
